modName: Draco Badbreath and Drake Redwinger the pet dragons
summary: Adds a dragon(s) as a pet.
descriptionHtml:
Adds Draco Badbreath or Drake Redwinger as a pet dragon that will follow you all the time. Does not replace anything.

To get him enter the console and type \"help draco 0\" or \"help drake 0\" without quotes. find the ID number should end in AE571 for Draco or AE572 for Drake. then type \"player.placeatme <ID> 1\" After he spawns open the console again, select him and type \"setplayerteammate 1\" without quotes.

Notes:
Animation is buggy, I took a regular dragon and made it small, weird stuff happens.
If he wont fast travel with you there\'s nothing I can do about it. that\'s a Skyrim bug.
to make him wait someplace use the console, select him and type \"TAI\" without quotes, repeat to make him follow again.
I use Fancy Dov textures for the dragons and are not included, If you want them to look like in my screenshot download the texture pack here:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5357
author: jet4571
